user_request: Clear the cart on walmart. Add usb-b to the cart on walmart
screen_desc: The screenshot displays the Walmart mobile website showing a Cyber Monday deal on a Lenovo tablet, reduced from $199 to $129. A banner at the top promotes Cyber deals, and there's a cart icon with a $11.97 value. Below, users can select options for picking up or having items delivered, and there's a prompt to download the Walmart shopping app.
history_actions: click on the Chrome app icon located at the bottom right.
click on the address bar located at the top middle.
click on the first search suggestion "walmart.com" located just below the search bar
click on the search icon (a magnifying glass) located at the middle and upper part of the screen.
click on the cancel button located at the top right.

think_action.Thought: The user wants to clear the cart and add a USB-B item. The current screen shows the Walmart website with a cart icon displaying a total of $11.97. To clear the cart, I need to access it first. The best course of action is to click on the cart icon to view its contents.
Future Action Plan: Click on the cart icon to view its contents.
Remove all items from the cart to clear it.
Search for 'USB-B' using the search bar.
Add a relevant USB-B item to the cart.
think_action.Next Single Step Action: Click on the cart icon located at the top right.
